title: Beautiful 2br/1ba Apartment for Rent by Owner -- $2650/month – availa
posting_body: ['Beautiful 2br/1ba Apartment for Rent by Owner -- $2650/month – available on September 1st', 'Details:', '• Completely renovated, semi-furnished 2 bedroom/1 bath unit located in the heart of central Riverdale.', '• 64” wall-mounted TV.', '• Open kitchen offers granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances.', '• This is a first floor "no step" ADA Accessible unit.', 'ADA friendly bathroom features Kraus waterfall faucet and sink, Grohe shower fixtures, and 53” Jacuzzi with built-in seat.', '• Hardwood oak floors, all new electrical wiring and plumbing, three deep closets, one walk-in closet.', '• Close to schools, parks, Johnson Avenue shops and local/express buses.', '10-minute walk to Number 1 Subway train or to Spuyten Duyvil Metro North Station.', '•', 'The apartment is semi-furnished.', 'The furniture available is all 2 years old and in great condition.', 'Please see the 3D virtual tour for current furniture.', 'Applicants MUST meet the following requirements:', '• Annual income at least 40x monthly rent (verifiable)', '• Credit score of 720+', '• Excellent rental history', 'This is a well-maintained co-op building with friendly board (very easy interview over zoom) and excellent neighbors.', 'Quiet neighborhood.', 'Move-in date is September 1st.', 'No dogs.', 'Please see the full 3D virtual tour below.', '<URL>', 'Contact Max (646-808-5638) or Luba (646-592-0092) to schedule a tour!']
